title: Texture preserving garment transfer.
abstract: Dressing virtual characters is necessary for many applications, while modeling clothing is a significant bottleneck. Therefore, it has been proposed that the idea of Garment Transfer for transfer-ring clothing model from one character to another character [Brouet et al. 2012]. In recent years, this idea has been extended to be applicable between characters in various poses and shapes [Narita et al. 2014]. However, texture design of clothing is not preserved in their method since they deform the source clothing model to fit the target body (see Figure 1(a)(c)).
